001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
004import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
005import lombok.Getter;
006
007/**
008 * Represents a filtering component associated with a table cell.
009 * This class defines the type of UI component used for filtering
010 * and the specific filter type to be applied.
011 *
012 * <p>It is used in conjunction with {@code CellLocator} to specify
013 * filtering behaviors within a table structure.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017@AllArgsConstructor
018@Getter
019public class CellFilterComponent {
020
021   /**
022    * The type of UI component used for filtering.
023    */
024   private Class<? extends ComponentType> type;
025
026   /**
027    * The specific component type as a string representation.
028    */
029   private String componentType;
030}
